/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, divided by a median, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few trees punctuate the urban landscape, their green foliage contrasting with the concrete structures. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting a warm glow over the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
